description: Changed the riff for the chorus of the second part of the song so the first two notes are power chords and the note on the fifth fret of the E are played instead on open A. Tried to make the right speaker guitar and vocals different instruments (I don't know why it did this. I have them as different instruments in tuxguitar) Also tried to get rid of random tie in measure 136 of the rhythm guitar track
title: Megalomania

description: (Hopefully) changed the instrument of the vocal part to tenor sax. Fixed a few minor errors in the lyrics and rhythm guitar part.
title: Megalomania

description: Renamed tracks and added vocals and lyrics. Added trills in verses 2 and 4, put notes in between the long note in the second measure of the riff at 106. Added bass notes when guitar starts to play the main riff. Added piano during bridge section. Changed wood block in second part of the song to cowbell. Moved fills in verses 1 and 3 from main electric guitar track to fills track. Moved solo in main electric guitar track to new left speaker track.
title: Megalomania
